description: A service class for interacting with Stripe API through stubbed methods for creating checkout sessions and verifying webhooks, configured using application settings.

classes.name: StripeService
classes.description: A stubbed service class for handling Stripe payments and webhook verification, intended to be replaced with real Stripe SDK calls.

methods.name: __init__(self)
methods.description: Initializes the StripeService with API key and webhook secret from settings.

methods.name: dict create_checkout_session(self, price_id: str, customer_email: str, success_url: str, cancel_url: str)
methods.description: Creates a dummy checkout session, returning a mock session ID and URL, incorporating success URL, price ID, and customer email.

methods.name: dict verify_webhook(self, payload: bytes, sig_header: str)
methods.description: Verifies a webhook payload and signature, returning a dummy event structure indicating a completed invoice payment.

ctags.name: create_checkout_session
ctags.pattern: /^    def create_checkout_session(self, price_id: str, customer_email: str, success_url: str, canc/
ctags.signature: (self, price_id: str, customer_email: str, success_url: str, cancel_url: str)

ctags.name: verify_webhook
ctags.pattern: /^    def verify_webhook(self, payload: bytes, sig_header: str) -> dict:$/
